description: Detects a suspicious command line execution that invokes PowerShell with reference to an AppData folder Author: Florian Roth, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: PowerShell Script Run in AppData
query: (process.command_line:(*powershell.exe* OR *\\powershell*) AND process.command_line:*\/c\ * AND process.command_line:*\\AppData\\* AND process.command_line:(*Local\\* OR *Roaming\\*))
